prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with a sleek design and vibrant blue colors.
Show me a bug-type Pokemon that has unique angular features and a striking color palette.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines insect-like traits with mechanical elements and bright yellow accents.
Give me a visual of a Pokemon that embodies the essence of innovation and nature with its colors.
Design a Pokemon that looks both menacing and majestic with a streamlined body and vivid colors.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in forested environments, showcasing its electric abilities.
Make a Pokemon that represents both technology and nature, featuring a dynamic pose and colors.
